meanings.definition: A person or thing that lists.
meanings.sent1: The listers in the office always keep track of important tasks.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of listers organizing the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The listers at the grocery store made sure all the products were in order.
meanings.sent4: She was like a listers, carefully arranging her thoughts in a neat row.
meanings.sent5: The listers in the library made finding books so much easier.

meanings.definition: A device used for listing or tilting.
meanings.sent1: The listers on the ship helped keep it balanced in the rough waters.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used listers to adjust the angle of the platform.
meanings.sent3: The listers in the game were used to change the direction of the character.
meanings.sent4: The listers on the table made it easier to read the document.
meanings.sent5: The listers on the chair prevented it from tipping over.
